prompt: Someone told you to come and talk to me?

replies.1: Some kid told me to come up to you and start talking.
replies.2: Mah heart... Mah soul made me want to talk to you.

prompt: That kid is always telling people to come and talk to me...  maybe he knows I like the company.  I am sure glad that kiddo resides in our neighborhood.

replies.1: Seems like this place is very peaceful and has it made.

prompt: Why do I have the feeling someone told you to come and talk to me...

replies.1: Damn you are good! It was the kiddo in the middle house that told me to come and talk to you.

prompt: I wouldn't say we are at complete peace.  That kid has seen a thing or two and if you want to play detective I would talk to him.

replies.1: Sounds like a plan, nice talking to you Mr Jimmy.
